title: Who's The King of Crazy
body:
Everyone has been focused more on the Memers of this board as of late, so it's my turn to stir the pot. 

Who's the craziest out of the notable:

**AXIS OF MADNESS**


**Glory in Death**
Resident Sion main and Ship king, key player in starting this mess, takes fun in triggering people

http://www.deviantart.com/art/Sion-487994280

**Chaos689**
Resident Rengar main, who apparently plays him so much to the point of addiction... May also be stalking me online

http://www.deviantart.com/art/Rengar-459362493

**Aqualious18**
Resident Shaco main, aka me. I use a lot of dark humour that is twisted, write comments involve me killing people too... Probably going to get a lot of votes

BUT SOMETHING YOU SHOULD KNOWN: 
I not insane... Crazy, probably but... I like to put on a show and here people like to represent their mains, so I channel a bit more Shaco

Talking to me in real life might shock you after reading my posts

http://www.deviantart.com/art/Backstab-Backstab-268256799


Anyway
*LET THE MADNESS BE SHOWN*

Edit: 

Hades changed:
+ Aqualious 
 -1 Other


Keep the votes coming, The king (or prince if Other wins) is announced after the weekend

replies.body:
Glory in death uses sylar in his gifts
i'm sorry but he won

wait wait wait you also use sylar but what's more is

sylar's basic powers are telekinesis, additionally he is able to steal every power he can see. He is talking about a "thirst" which makes him killing everything
rubick can steal your spells and telekinesis is his own power...... and he also has a "thirst" for knowledge.
https://media.giphy.com/media/11pm4vhYBUSdO0/giphy.gif
http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/03/Shhh-Hungover-GIF.gif?gs=a

Wrong. He has the ability to steal powers, that is how he got his telekinesis. 
http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m4wriz2Adp1qcb58yo1_500.gif

http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/548b/6b7lsyd9n3mj2o8zg.jpg
Donald Duck, can't resist em.

I am obviously the King of Crazy here! I mean, really! Who else would have stuff like this saved in their computer?
https://i.imgflip.com/172mph.jpg
http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/cd0e92735b7cd7cdebcf99608c0355f1.jpg
http://pre01.deviantart.net/88c6/th/pre/i/2014/287/9/6/_lol__female_sion__by_n1ps-d82s685.png
http://img05.deviantart.net/17fb/i/2014/304/9/2/female_sion___by_monorirogue-d84rmj1.jpg
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/a9/a99176f17f98d40c567bce80a2707a2090dddb5e93468bca673bcc1b69c4ecf8.jpg
http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/7ba5/wb7qv36x208r40ezg.jpg
https://media0.giphy.com/media/3o7WTIVuAOn8lBYN7W/200w.gif
Do you really want to know?
http://www.mediafire.com/convkey/548b/6b7lsyd9n3mj2o8zg.jpg

LOL I voted Other, but now I regret it. Can't undo the pol. So I am just going to undo it here.
Aqualious18 +1
Other -1
Anyone who mains Shaco is definitely top candidate for King of Crazy.

On the contrary...

Yeah okay I got nothing

Anyone who has a number in his name (except 41noob and ironangel) are forever not able to come to the kool cids table.

Sorry m8.

B-but MY numbers have a meaning!
And Aqualious is the... ummm... er.... the 18th person ever  to play shaco!

> [{quoted}](name=Chaos689,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AilrvEEk,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-07-08T11:35:23.099+0000)
>
> B-but MY numbers have a meaning!
> And Aqualious is the... ummm... er.... the 18th person ever  to play shaco!

^ This
A good NUMBER of people have digits in their name, they aren't all crazy

meanwhile I stare at all of this and think 

http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_ma327q39xN1qcwyxho1_400.gif

when I know the answer
which is my dear friend?
Have you ever noticed how it's always me and Aqualious (BTW I made an account named after you just because... I don't even use it.) are always the only two people posting at like 11:30 at night here?
It's 3 am here
Where are you? 5 hours after your post, it's 3 AM for me

Somewhere in Europe

~~It's an actual location~~

Lol

I use that phrase all the time
Which one?
Somewhere in Europe, not the best at know where countries and cities are sometimes
Well, I use the phrase more for privacy, but I know what you mean. I'm not exactly the best at geography myself.

It's 8pm here... And I'm sorry....

YOU DID WHAT?

I made an account named after my hero!
It's level 3 and named something like aQu4lIoU5 19?...
Just for u bby just for u

Why am I your hero...?

We've only started communications since Sunday and it started as an argument over how bad teemo is... I believe
You're my hero becuase I form rapid obsessions and cling to them for life...

http://www.mmocentralforums.com/gallery/data/3615/pff_alright_you_win_forever.gif
https://media4.giphy.com/media/3oxRmGXbquXKz6DNPq/200w.gif

LAST CALL FOR VOTERS, IF YOU'VE VISITED THE PAGE PLEASE VOTE

FIGHT AGAINST VOTER APATHY
I just realized that he thinks it's only online  ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

What's my name

Where do I live 

How old am I?
I dunno, I can be pretty crazy too...
http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m8ghad1qJe1qkvue8o1_250.gif
Yes?

Aww thank you <3
You noticed me!
